Package com.library.utils.tableviews

Class BookTableViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.library.utils.tableviews.BookTableViewBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
TableViewBuilder<Book>
public class BookTableViewBuilder extends Object implements TableViewBuilder<Book>
The BookTableViewBuilder class implements the TableViewBuilder interface to create and configure JavaFX TableView columns for the Book entity. It defines columns for book properties such as ID, number of times used, and status.
